TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Update: I have translated the Dreeâ€™s name for the area we find ourselves in. Apparently, the Dree refer to everywhere enclosed by this plant the <color=purple>Deep Bramble</color>.
SENNETTI: The specific chamber surrounding <color=orange>Shattered Hearth</color>, however, is simply called the <color=orange>Home Dimension</color>
AZOLLA: Keep up the good work, Sennetti. We all appreciate your efforts, both towards deciphering the Dree language and keeping us updated.
NESIA: Interesting. Do you suppose that the existence of a â€œDeepâ€? Bramble implies the existence of a â€œShallowâ€? Bramble?
OKALIS: Perhaps the Shallow Bramble is where the <color=orange>Vessel</color> was stranded?
